definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to expand (esp. by new recruitment)/to increase the army/to augment
to increase the number of pages or the size of the pages of a publication
to enlarge color photos/color film processing

sentences.english: The patients with poor blood supply were pretreated with drugs to enlarge blood vessels and improve microcirculation.
sentences.chinese: 血供差者適當給予擴血管及疏通微循環藥。

sentences.english: How do you bring forward the build-out of infrastructure?
sentences.chinese: 如何進行基礎設施的擴呢？

sentences.english: Allow there to be a softening outwards, away from the the nose across the cheek bones.
sentences.chinese: 鼻腔擴放鬆張向外，從鼻子到臉頰都擴張開。

sentences.english: Rabbit thoracic aortic rings were used to investigate the vasodilator mechanisms of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 用離體血管環研究了東莨菪鹼擴血管作用的機制。

sentences.english: The E7500 is a fixed configuration and is not expandable.
The method can be used to estimate DS-SS parameters in non-cooperative communications.
sentences.chinese: 該方法可用於非合作通信中直擴信號的參數估計。

sentences.english: Methods 21 cases of such patient were received the lip-side expansion.
sentences.chinese: 方法對21例患者進行上頜脣向擴弓活動矯治器治療。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the antioxidation and vasodilator effect of Ziyingmingmu Pill(ZYMMP).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討滋陰明目丸抗氧化及擴血管的作用。

sentences.english: There are many kinds actually and one such kind is the aromatherapy nebulizer diffuser.
sentences.chinese: 其實有很多種，其中一種是香薰霧化擴。

sentences.english: The MPF will, furthermore, bring you to wider horizons in the future.
sentences.chinese: 此外，強積金計劃將有助擴惗保險業的領域。

sentences.english: The aromatherapy nebulizer diffuser also has a clear, blown-glass looking device.
sentences.chinese: 香薰霧化擴也很明確，吹玻璃看裝置。

sentences.english: Platinum doping is need before nickel chemical plating for FR rectifiers.

one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
